import React from 'react' import Adminnav from './Adminnav' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState , useEffect } from 'react' function Adminblog() { const [isLogin,updateLogin] = useState() const [data, updateData] = useState({ blog: "", image: "", keyword: "", shortdesc: "", desc: "" }) const handleChange = (e) => { updateData({ ...data, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const handleSubmit = () => { console.log(data) } useEffect(()=>{ if(sessionStorage.getItem('interacc-admin-login') == "true"){ updateLogin(true) } },[]) return ( <> {isLogin == true ?
